'''Pippin Gardner''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Pippin was the third son and fifth child of [[Samwise Gamgee]] and [[Rose Cotton]], born in {{SR|1429}}.<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref> He was named after [[Peregrin Took|Pippin Took]] at the suggestion of [[Frodo Baggins]].<ref>{{RK|Havens}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Pippin'' is a translation of ''Razan'', a [[Westron]] word for a small type of apple.<ref>{{PM|Languages}}</ref>  In [[Sindarin]], the name ''Pippin'' is ''Cordof''.<ref>{{SD|XI2}}</ref><ref group=note>It is not clear whether Pippin's name was a short of ''Peregrin'' as was the case of his namesake.</ref>
